item.title: Some Better Desk Research
item.description: 2021-04-10 Tust trawling image search for some inspiration Clamped From here, like the clamp since it doesn’t take over your entire desk. But I’m only seeing enough space for a laptop and hmm not a whole monitor. Bracket for big screens This one though , wow looks like an extension for your screen too nice. Hmm permanant tall desk Actually, reading that home Edit site more, I like the concept of just having a tall desk to begin with.
